availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Still (Nicholas Co, KY, hotel keeper)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Nicholas County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Bradley Still in Harrison County on January 15, 1854. Father of J. Warren Still, Henry C. Still, Eliza Still, and Bettie Still. Keeper of the Nicholas House hotel in Carlisle, Nicholas County, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, p. 279.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 531B and 532A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Rolls #994027-994058, Harrison County Marriages, p. 3.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Rolls #994027-994058, Nicholas County Births, p. 4.
